attributes.action: End Foreign Aid:  Stop spending Taxpayer's money abroad!
attributes.additional_details:
Cease the payment of Foreign Aid to ALL countries.  Foreign Aid simply takes money from the poor people of a rich country and gives it to the rich people of a poor country.

For every £1 spent on Foreign Aid, approx £6 is voluntarily donated to overseas charities by UK residents.  This money actually goes directly to help the people who need it most......not given to foreign governments to spend how they please.

Basically, stop spending the peoples money.
